short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Updates the standard favicon on HubSpot tabs with colored versions to help differentiate between environments and organizations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
